citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am to 12:30
pm on December 6, 2023. During this time, the inspector waited at the facility, called phone numbers on file leaving a
message, knocked on doors, and left a flyer on door to contact inspector.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am to 12:30 
pm on December 6, 2023. During this time, the inspector waited at the facility, called phone numbers on file leaving a 
message, knocked on doors, and left a flyer on door to contact inspector. 
 
 
End Section
